actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: To amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to establish a term of office for the Administrator of General Services.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to establish a four-year term of office for the Administrator of the General Services Administration and to require the Deputy Administrator to be a career appointee. Increases the compensation payable under the Executive Schedule to the Administrator from Level III to Level II, and to the Deputy Administrator from Level IV to Level III.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to establish a term of office for the Administrator of General Services.
